```{r setup}
library(rlgd)
library(parallel)
library(caret)
library(formula.tools)
```


```{r}
data("breast_cancer")
breast_cancer
```

```{r}
x <- as.matrix(breast_cancer[,1:9])
y <- breast_cancer[,"classe"]
y <- as.matrix(ifelse(y$classe =="malignant",1,0))
theta <- as.matrix(rnorm(n = dim(x)[2], mean = 0, sd = 1))
cost_function(x,y,theta)
```
```{r}
theta
```



```{r}
set.seed(10)
train_index <- createDataPartition(breast_cancer$classe, p = 0.7, list = F)
train_set <- breast_cancer[train_index, ]
test_set <- breast_cancer[-train_index, ]
```

```{r}
res <- rlgd.fit(classe~.,train_set,mode="batch", max_iter = 1000,learning_rate = 0.01, tol = 1e-5, standardize = T)
```
```{r}
print(res)
```


```{r}
y_pred<- rlgd.predict(res,test_set[,res$x_names],"class")
```


```{r}
test_set$classe <- as.factor(test_set$classe)
levels(test_set$classe) <- c(0, 1)
accuracy <- mean(y_pred == test_set$classe)
accuracy
```
